nodes.text: Quarren Eye was a hyperdrive-equipped yacht given to Garik Loran by Borath Maddeus as part of his investigation. The ship's communication system was wired to transmit data back to Maddeus, which led to his implication when he tried to kill Loran and a fictitious team of Wraith Squadron members that Loran had been ostensibly transmitting to using the ship's communication system.
